mapper.select: select likecheck from p_like where BNO = #{BNO} and ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: insert into p_like (bno , id, likecheck) values(#{bno},#{id},1)
mapper.delete: delete from p_like where bno = #{bno} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: update place as p join p_like as l on p.bno=l.bno set likecnt=likecnt+1 where l.likecheck>0;
update place as p join p_like as l on p.bno=l.bno set likecnt=likecnt-1 where l.likecheck>0;
